title: [LFM] Creating team GOLD+
body:
Be willing to listen and play consistent hours.

[ AS OF NOW JUST LOOKING FOR A SUPPORT TO TRIAL. ]

REQUIREMENTS
*****BE GOLD+
*****HAVE AN OPEN MIND TO IMPROVING
*****UNDERSTAND THAT EVERYONE HAS A ROLE TO PLAY
*****UNDERSTAND THAT THIS IS A PROCESS OF BECOMING A GOOD TEAM, WE WILL WORK OUT KINKS ONE AT A TIME *****BE ON TIME FOR PRACTICE
*****HAVE A SOLID, META (NOT GALIO) POOL OF CHAMPIONS.
****** IF YOU ARE FROM NSW, BIG BONUS SO SPECIFY.

SAMPLE PRACTICE TIMES:
6/7-10:oo PM Monday/Thursday/Friday.

We will be running a proper system to how the team will work and be building around what we feel is our best players, so if you're confident in your skill and want to be built around then this is a good opportunity. If you're solid, dont lose lane and want a team with actual teamplay, this is also for you, and no, im not just going to make myself a god and will ask the team what we should build around.

Long story about my account.  Will explain if we go into further talks.

If you want to just apply here, just follow template.

NAME:
IGN:
AGE:
ROLE:
CHAMP POOL:

Add me on: BananaSlamJamma
